title: Gorsuch Settles in as Kennedy Considers Retirement (Audio)
itunes:title: Gorsuch Settles in as Kennedy Considers Retirement (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Greg Stohr, Bloomberg News Supreme Court reporter and co-host of Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law," discusses reports that Justice Anthony Kennedy might be considering retirement, just as Neil Gorsuch begins his term on the bench. He speaks with Bloomberg's June Grasso and Michael Best.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
